spell.name: Beast Totem

m.text: a figurine in the shape of the beast the spell targets worth at least 25gp

entries: You hold out the figurine and target a willing beast of CR 1/2 or lower within range, binding the beast to the figurine. While the beast is bound and you possess the figurine, you can use your bonus action to dismiss the beast into the figurine (so long as you are on the same plane of existence), or to call it forth to an unoccupied space within 10 feet of you. You can't make a bond with a beast that is {@condition charmed} or {@condition incapacitated}.

While inside the figurine time passes normally for the beast, however it does not age, require food or water, and it is immune to any damage, conditions, or harmful effects. The beast cannot be dismissed while it is {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition restrained}, {@condition frightened}, or {@condition charmed}.

Should the beast ever be slain, you can use this figurine in place of the creature's body for the purpose of resurrection. The beast's bond to the figurine ends if either you or the beast spend 10 minutes focusing on your bond to do so, or if the figurine is broken. The beast can choose to break the bond even while inside of the figurine. If the bond is ended while the beast is inside of figurine, the beast immediately appears in the nearest unoccupied space to the figurine.

You can have a number of beast totems equal to your spellcasting ability modifier (minimum of 1). If you cast this spell on a beast while you have your maximum amount of bound figurines, you must choose to end one of the bonds or the spell fails.

spell.name: Cordon of Arrows
entries: You plant four pieces of nonmagical ammunition—arrows or crossbow bolts—in the ground within range and lay magic upon them to protect an area. Until the spell ends, whenever a creature other than you comes within 30 feet of the ammunition for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there, one piece of ammunition flies up to strike it. The creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 2d6} + your spell casting modifier piercing damage. The piece of ammunition is then destroyed. The spell ends when no ammunition remains.
When you cast this spell, you can designate any creatures you choose, and the spell ignores them.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the amount of ammunition that can be affected increases by four for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Conjure Barrage

components.m: ammunition or a thrown weapon, which is not consumed

entries: You throw a nonmagical weapon or fire a piece of nonmagical ammunition into the air to create a cone of identical weapons that shoot forward and then disappear. Choose any number of creatures in a 60 foot cone, and divide 20 projectiles among them (a creature can be targeted by up to 5 projectiles). Each creature must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 1d8} damage for each projectile launched at it, or half as much on a succesful save. The damage type is the same as that of the weapon or ammunition used as a component.

spell.name: Grasping Vine
entries: You conjure a vine that erupts from the ground in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within range. When you cast this spell, you can direct the vine to lash out at a creature large or smaller within 60 feet of it that you can see. That creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled}, take {@damage 3d8} bludgeoning damage and be pulled 30 feet directly toward the vine. While the vine is grappling a creature, you can use a bonus action to deal {@damage 3d8} bludgeoning damage to it. At the end of each of its turn the creature can repeat the saving throw, escaping the grapple on a success.
Until the spell ends, you can direct the vine to lash out at the same creature or another one as a bonus action on each of your turns.

spell.name: Hail of Thorns

components.m: a weapon or piece of ammunition

entries: You wrap a weapon or a piece of ammunition you are holding in magical brambles, and make a weapon attack against a creature within range. On a hit, the target takes damage as normal. Hit or miss, the brambles explode outward. The target and each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d10} piercing damage and have their speed halved until the end of their next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: The bramble's damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st, to a maximum of {@dice 6d10}.

spell.name: Hurricane Slash
entries: A tempest whirls about you as the frenzied wind takes the shape of blades that bend to your will. You can use a melee weapon you are wielding to make a melee attack against every creature within 15 feet of you. On a hit, the attack deals damage as normal plus an additional {@damage 3d6} slashing damage. On a miss, the target instead only takes {@damage 3d6} slashing damage.

spell.name: Imbue Element

components.m: a weapon or piece of ammunition

entries: You imbue a creature you touch with elemental energy. Choose one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. For the duration, the creature's weapon attacks are considered magical and deal an additional {@dice 1d6} of the chosen damage type. Additionally, any creature that hits the imbued creature with a melee attack takes {@dice 1d6} of the chosen type.

spell.name: Lightning Arrow

components.m: a thrown weapon or piece of ammunition

entries: When you cast this spell, you throw a weapon or fire a piece of ammunition at a target you can see within range, which transforms into a ravenous lightning bolt as it leaves your hands. Make a ranged weapon attack with that weapon against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 6d8} lightning damage and their speed is reduced to 0 until the start of your next turn. On a miss, the target takes half as much damage and does not have its speed reduced. A target that has lightning resistance or immunity does not have their speed reduced.

Hit or miss, each creature within 10 feet of the target (excluding the target) must make a Dexterity save. Each creature takes {@damage 2d8} thunder damage on a failed save, or half damage on a success. The weapon or ammunition then returns to its normal form.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: The initial shot's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd, to a maximum of {@dice 8d8}.

spell.name: Primeval Awareness

m.text: a figurine worth at least 50gp, in the shape of any creature of the type you are searching for

entries: You become deeply in tune with your surroundings, becoming sensitive to the presence of the unnatural. Choose one of the following types of creatures: aberrations, celestials, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead. You can tell whether or not creatures of this type are present within range of you. You become aware of the direction to the nearest group of such creatures, and how many of them are in the group.

spell.name: Zephyr Strike

components.m: a weapon or piece of ammunition

entries: A howling gale whips around your body, and you feel yourself become as light as wind. For the duration, your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.
Additionally, you can choose to end this spell before you make an attack to grant that attack advantage. On a hit, this attack deals an additional {@damage 1d8} damage.
